description: Length of maximal prime gap p_{k+1} - p_k with starting prime p_k < 10^n.
comments: Prime gaps associated with A053302.a(17) is probably 1220 and a(19) is probably 1296. - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 16 2004
links: Thomas R. Nicely, First occurrence prime gaps
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime Gaps
example: a(1) = 4 from 7 to 11. a(2) = 8 from 89 to 97. a(3) = 20 from 887 to 907.a(5)=72 because the 5-digit prime 31397 begins a gap of 72.
crossrefs: p_k's are in A053302. Cf. A005250, A002386. Essentially the same as A038460.
author: _Enoch Haga_, Mar 05 2000
